titleInfo.title: March of Dimes Gospel Festival '79 at War Memorial Building (20519)

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on white) announcing March of Dimes Gospel Festival '79 featuring Bobby Jones and New Life Co., DeWitt Johnson Ensemble, T. Sweeney Ensemble, B. C. and E. Choir, and St. Marks Ensemble at War Memorial Auditorium on March 18. Poster features a metal photoplate of Bobby Jones and New Life Co. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/51734/

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
